                    阅读4分钟
                  </span> <!----></div></div> <div style="flex:1;" data-v-61fb5e44=""></div> <!----> <!----></div> <!----> <!----> <!----> <!----> <div id="article-root" itemprop="articleBody" class="main" data-v-61fb5e44=""><div class="article-viewer markdown-body result"><blockquote>
<p>大家好，我是石小石！一个热爱技术分享的开源社区贡献者，小册《<a href="https://juejin.cn/book/7514684308372586537?utm_source=course_list" target="_blank" title="https://juejin.cn/book/7514684308372586537?utm_source=course_list">油猴脚本实战指南</a>》作者。</p>
</blockquote>
<hr>
<p>油猴（Tampermonkey）是一款浏览器插件，允许用户在网页加载时注入自定义的 JavaScript 脚本，来<strong>增强、修改或自动化网页行为（你可以理解为轻量版谷歌扩展插件）</strong> 。</p>
<blockquote>
<p>如果你还是不理解，参考：<a href="https://juejin.cn/book/7514684308372586537/section/7514684308339032118" target="_blank" title="https://juejin.cn/book/7514684308372586537/section/7514684308339032118">什么是油猴脚本，它的作用是什么</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p>下面，分享我精心整理的10个好用脚本！</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/c5543b62f3834928a49bc38e6f11957d~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55-z5bCP55-zT3J6:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1750862415&amp;x-signature=pkGZui3DTLy0gzwgDF2d%2BRBLLZc%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-0">下载工具类</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-1">Github 增强 - 高速下载</h3>
<p>安装后为 Github 的 <strong>Git Clone/SSH、Release、Raw、Code(ZIP)</strong> 等任何需要下载的文件添加 <strong>高速下载（加速下载）</strong> ！同时在项目列表页，添加<strong>单文件快捷下载 (</strong> <strong>☁</strong> <strong>)</strong> 链接，方便单独下载某个文件、在项目 Git 地址处，自动在开头添加 <code>git clone</code> 命令。</p>
<blockquote>
<p>脚本地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgreasyfork.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fscripts%2F412245-github-enhancement-high-speed-download%25E9%2593%25BE%25E6%258E%25A5" target="_blank" title="https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/412245-github-enhancement-high-speed-download%E9%93%BE%E6%8E%A5" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Github 增强 - 高速下载</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p>如下图，开启脚本后，增加了多个下载地址：</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/d342695ca0f54cf6bc1a80a757cca0d7~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55-z5bCP55-zT3J6:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1750862415&amp;x-signature=ywSB%2BACkah7i77cn%2Btf8E4ngFTg%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-2">图片下载器</h3>
<p>可以在绝大多数网站提取并批量下载图片。抓取能力大提升！现在可以抓取，H5游戏素材（4399），图库网站（千库网、包图网），漫画网站（腾讯漫画、b站漫画），文库网站（道客巴巴、豆丁），以及其他右键失效或者图片不能另存的网站，用脚本均可以提取并下载。</p>
<blockquote>
<p>脚本地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgreasyfork.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fscripts%2F419894-image-downloader" target="_blank" title="https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/419894-image-downloader" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">图片下载器</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/510a0c62a29c49748dcdb080101f6af2~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55-z5bCP55-zT3J6:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1750862415&amp;x-signature=ttPuMcXeiuUsgZXe%2F336%2FxMEhf8%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-3">掘金/CSDN复制，文章下载为MD</h3>
<p>右键复制网页元素内容（类名、文本、HTML、Markdown），支持下载为 Markdown，使用 Vue + Element Plus + Turndown 实现。Markdown下载功能目前只做了掘金、CSDN的兼容，其余网站没特意试过。</p>
<p>PS：这个脚本是小册《<a href="https://juejin.cn/book/7514684308372586537?utm_source=course_list" target="_blank" title="https://juejin.cn/book/7514684308372586537?utm_source=course_list">油猴脚本开发实战</a>》的配套示例</p>
<blockquote>
<p>脚本地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgreasyfork.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fscripts%2F535102-%25E5%2585%2583%25E7%25B4%25A0%25E5%25B1%259E%25E6%2580%25A7%25E5%25A4%258D%25E5%2588%25B6" target="_blank" title="https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/535102-%E5%85%83%E7%B4%A0%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7%E5%A4%8D%E5%88%B6" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">石小石的脚本</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/bc9b6d782edf40be9951b918e289a580~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55-z5bCP55-zT3J6:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1750862415&amp;x-signature=UKu%2BGU0GNhe0Dfj18HqOpwQB41o%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">网页增强类</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-5">Bilibili - 在未登录的情况下自动并无限试用最高画质</h3>
<p>在未登录的情况下自动并无限试用最高画质</p>
<blockquote>
<p>脚本地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgreasyfork.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fscripts%2F467511-bilibili-%25E5%259C%25A8%25E6%259C%25AA%25E7%2599%25BB%25E5%25BD%2595%25E7%259A%2584%25E6%2583%2585%25E5%2586%25B5%25E4%25B8%258B%25E8%2587%25AA%25E5%258A%25A8%25E5%25B9%25B6%25E6%2597%25A0%25E9%2599%2590%25E8%25AF%2595%25E7%2594%25A8%25E6%259C%2580%25E9%25AB%2598%25E7%2594%25BB%25E8%25B4%25A8" target="_blank" title="https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/467511-bilibili-%E5%9C%A8%E6%9C%AA%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95%E7%9A%84%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%E4%B8%8B%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E5%B9%B6%E6%97%A0%E9%99%90%E8%AF%95%E7%94%A8%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%E7%94%BB%E8%B4%A8" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Bilibili无限试用高画质</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/bcac00c2b3ea4a4084706fadc35429fa~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55-z5bCP55-zT3J6:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1750862415&amp;x-signature=o7yEgJx1vhL1mu2PU%2BTeCVwHpwY%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-6">VIp视频解析</h3>
<p>全网VIP视频免费破解去广告，知乎使用增强，短视频无水印下载，油管、Facebook等国外视频解析下载等。</p>
<blockquote>
<p>脚本地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgreasyfork.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fscripts%2F534863-b%25E7%25AB%2599%25E5%2593%2594%25E5%2593%25A9%25E5%2593%2594%25E5%2593%25A9%25E4%25BD%25BF%25E7%2594%25A8%25E5%25A2%259E%25E5%25BC%25BA-%25E5%2585%25A8%25E7%25BD%2591vip%25E8%25A7%2586%25E9%25A2%2591%25E5%2585%258D%25E8%25B4%25B9%25E7%25A0%25B4%25E8%25A7%25A3%25E5%258E%25BB%25E5%25B9%25BF%25E5%2591%258A-%25E7%259F%25A5%25E4%25B9%258E%25E4%25BD%25BF%25E7%2594%25A8%25E5%25A2%259E%25E5%25BC%25BA-%25E7%259F%25AD%25E8%25A7%2586%25E9%25A2%2591%25E6%2597%25A0%25E6%25B0%25B4%25E5%258D%25B0%25E4%25B8%258B%25E8%25BD%25BD-%25E6%25B2%25B9%25E7%25AE%25A1-facebook%25E7%25AD%2589%25E5%259B%25BD%25E5%25A4%2596%25E8%25A7%2586%25E9%25A2%2591%25E8%25A7%25A3%25E6%259E%2590%25E4%25B8%258B%25E8%25BD%25BD%25E7%25AD%2589" target="_blank" title="https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/534863-b%E7%AB%99%E5%93%94%E5%93%A9%E5%93%94%E5%93%A9%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E5%A2%9E%E5%BC%BA-%E5%85%A8%E7%BD%91vip%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E5%85%8D%E8%B4%B9%E7%A0%B4%E8%A7%A3%E5%8E%BB%E5%B9%BF%E5%91%8A-%E7%9F%A5%E4%B9%8E%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E5%A2%9E%E5%BC%BA-%E7%9F%AD%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E6%97%A0%E6%B0%B4%E5%8D%B0%E4%B8%8B%E8%BD%BD-%E6%B2%B9%E7%AE%A1-facebook%E7%AD%89%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E8%A7%A3%E6%9E%90%E4%B8%8B%E8%BD%BD%E7%AD%89" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">视频解析</a><a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=" title="" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">链接</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p>开启后，vip视频界面会有一个按钮，点击可以播放vip视频（第三方接口）</p>
<p>此类脚本很多，如果这个不行，多试几个</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/fa960fbea24e45708235587934c205b0~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55-z5bCP55-zT3J6:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1750862415&amp;x-signature=DfCM9tckJGv81A63FK0002HanJA%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-7">百度网盘SVIP解析高速下载-度娘加速</h3>
<p>百度网盘SVIP解析高速下载,24小时维护100%可以用！使用IDM下载更加稳定IDM UA设置：LogStatistic Chrome浏览器一定打开开发者模式才能正常显示出来!</p>
<blockquote>
<p>脚本地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgreasyfork.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fscripts%2F512984-%25E7%2599%25BE%25E5%25BA%25A6%25E7%25BD%2591%25E7%259B%2598svip%25E8%25A7%25A3%25E6%259E%2590%25E9%25AB%2598%25E9%2580%259F%25E4%25B8%258B%25E8%25BD%25BD-%25E5%25BA%25A6%25E5%25A8%2598%25E5%258A%25A0%25E9%2580%259F" target="_blank" title="https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/512984-%E7%99%BE%E5%BA%A6%E7%BD%91%E7%9B%98svip%E8%A7%A3%E6%9E%90%E9%AB%98%E9%80%9F%E4%B8%8B%E8%BD%BD-%E5%BA%A6%E5%A8%98%E5%8A%A0%E9%80%9F" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">百度svip解析</a></p>
</blockquote>

<p>PS：此脚本内置广告，使用体验一般</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-8">广告拦截类</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-9">CSDN广告完全过滤</h3>
<ul>
<li>无需登录CSDN，获得比会员更佳的体验、🖥自定义背景图，分辨率自适配，分屏不用滚动</li>
<li>原创文章免登录展开</li>
<li>免登录复制|</li>
<li>防外链重定向</li>
<li>独家论坛未登录自动展开文章</li>
<li>评论|🌵全面净化|📈沉浸阅读|🧴净化剪贴板</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>脚本地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgreasyfork.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fscripts%2F378351-csdngreener-csdn%25E5%25B9%25BF%25E5%2591%258A%25E5%25AE%258C%25E5%2585%25A8%25E8%25BF%2587%25E6%25BB%25A4-%25E5%2585%258D%25E7%2599%25BB%25E5%25BD%2595-%25E4%25B8%25AA%25E6%2580%25A7%25E5%258C%2596%25E6%258E%2592%25E7%2589%2588-%25E6%259C%2580%25E5%25BC%25BA%25E8%2580%2581%25E7%2589%258C%25E8%2584%259A%25E6%259C%25AC-%25E6%258C%2581%25E7%25BB%25AD%25E6%259B%25B4%25E6%2596%25B0" target="_blank" title="https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/378351-csdngreener-csdn%E5%B9%BF%E5%91%8A%E5%AE%8C%E5%85%A8%E8%BF%87%E6%BB%A4-%E5%85%8D%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95-%E4%B8%AA%E6%80%A7%E5%8C%96%E6%8E%92%E7%89%88-%E6%9C%80%E5%BC%BA%E8%80%81%E7%89%8C%E8%84%9A%E6%9C%AC-%E6%8C%81%E7%BB%AD%E6%9B%B4%E6%96%B0" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">CSDN广告完全过滤</a></p>

<h2 data-id="heading-10"><strong>效率工具类</strong></h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-11"><strong>网页记事本</strong></h3>
<p>一个超超超好用的备忘录～再也不用担心忘记什么啦！自动通过域名分类，适用于全部网站～超实用的生产力工具～</p>
<blockquote>
<p><strong>脚本地址：</strong> <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgreasyfork.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fscripts%2F421876-q-note-%25E7%25BD%2591%25E7%25AB%2599%25E5%25A4%2587%25E5%25BF%2598%25E5%25BD%2595" target="_blank" title="https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/421876-q-note-%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99%E5%A4%87%E5%BF%98%E5%BD%95" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><strong>Q-note【网站备忘录】</strong></a></p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/7a56b002661a4c9db07cdcc1235e5c20~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55-z5bCP55-zT3J6:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1750862415&amp;x-signature=Iatp7ETrfyz5ZIvTw2u0%2F1z0AT4%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-12">解除复制限制</h3>
<blockquote>
<p>脚本地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgreasyfork.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fscripts%2F515938-%25E6%259C%2580%25E5%25BC%25BA-%25E6%259C%2580%25E5%2585%25A8%25E9%259D%25A2-%25E5%2585%25A8%25E7%25BD%2591%25E9%25A1%25B5%25E5%258F%25AF%25E7%2594%25A8-%25E6%258C%2581%25E7%25BB%25AD%25E6%259B%25B4%25E6%2596%25B0%25E4%25B8%25AD-%25E8%25A7%25A3%25E9%2599%25A4%25E7%25A6%2581%25E6%25AD%25A2%25E5%25A4%258D%25E5%2588%25B6%25E5%2592%258C%25E7%25B2%2598%25E8%25B4%25B4%25E9%2599%2590%25E5%2588%25B6%25E5%25B9%25B6%25E6%2594%25AF%25E6%258C%2581%25E6%2589%258B%25E5%258A%25A8%25E7%25B2%2598%25E8%25B4%25B4" target="_blank" title="https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/515938-%E6%9C%80%E5%BC%BA-%E6%9C%80%E5%85%A8%E9%9D%A2-%E5%85%A8%E7%BD%91%E9%A1%B5%E5%8F%AF%E7%94%A8-%E6%8C%81%E7%BB%AD%E6%9B%B4%E6%96%B0%E4%B8%AD-%E8%A7%A3%E9%99%A4%E7%A6%81%E6%AD%A2%E5%A4%8D%E5%88%B6%E5%92%8C%E7%B2%98%E8%B4%B4%E9%99%90%E5%88%B6%E5%B9%B6%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81%E6%89%8B%E5%8A%A8%E7%B2%98%E8%B4%B4" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">解除复制限制</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p>破解所有网站【禁止复制】和【禁止粘贴】限制，支持【模拟人工输入】。安装后，打开目标网页即可解除限制。若粘贴解锁不生效，可以使用ctrl+m呼出浮动输入框进行模拟人工输入</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-13">开发工具类</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-14">vue项目路由切换工具</h3>
<p>一切切换vue2/vue3项目的路由，无需手动输入，极大提升开发效率。</p>
<blockquote>
<p>脚本地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgreasyfork.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fscripts%2F471574-vue-router-tool" target="_blank" title="https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/471574-vue-router-tool" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scrip…</a><a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=" title="" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">链接</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p>PS：这个脚本是小册《<a href="https://juejin.cn/book/7514684308372586537?utm_source=course_list" target="_blank" title="https://juejin.cn/book/7514684308372586537?utm_source=course_list">油猴脚本开发实战</a>》的配套示例</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/4c0faf0d2451437081c5016501bf764f~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55-z5bCP55-zT3J6:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1750862415&amp;x-signature=z0AA4KFj0t0jJ7H%2BrGRkeysY6Gk%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-15">接口拦截与修改</h3>
<p>可以拦截网站上的请求、支持修改请求头、响应体，在开发测试中非常实用。</p>
<p>如下：修改CSDN的博客数据返回值。</p>
<blockquote>
<p>PS：本脚本暂未开源，但原理在小册《<a href="https://juejin.cn/book/7514684308372586537?utm_source=course_list" target="_blank" title="https://juejin.cn/book/7514684308372586537?utm_source=course_list">油猴脚本开发实战</a>》中有讲解。</p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/6933e8f2ecec45ce83a045faf1a5dd5f~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55-z5bCP55-zT3J6:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1750862415&amp;x-signature=Sbr7dhLKqpftq10SHd%2BBOHwBfw4%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-16">学习油猴脚本开发</h2>
<p>如果你对油猴脚本开发感兴趣，可以看看这个：《<a href="https://juejin.cn/book/7514684308372586537?utm_source=course_list" target="_blank" title="https://juejin.cn/book/7514684308372586537?utm_source=course_list">油猴脚本开发实战</a>》</p></div></div>
